idea_name: How to Spot a Fake Bank Text
idea_text: A video where your friend gets a scam text from a bank they don’t even use.
project_folder: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250712

assets.artwork_prompt: Create an Instagram story image featuring the character from the reference image, set in a cozy living room with soft, warm lighting. The character is seated on a comfortable couch, casually dressed in a rust-colored t-shirt and dark blue jeans, holding a smartphone. Her expression is one of surprise and slight confusion as she reads a scam text message supposedly from a bank she doesn't use. The room is decorated with a few potted plants and a coffee table in front of her, creating a relaxed atmosphere. A window in the background lets in natural light, casting gentle shadows across the room. The camera angle is slightly over-the-shoulder, capturing both her reaction and the phone screen, emphasizing the unexpected nature of the message.
assets.artwork_path: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250712/artwork.png
assets.script: "Whoa, I just got a text saying my account's locked, but it's from a bank I don’t even use! Classic scam alert. Never click on links like these—always double-check with your actual bank."
assets.audio_path: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250712/audio.mp3
assets.srt_path: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250712/subtitles.srt
assets.scenario_path: storage/7_How to Spot a Fake Bank Text_20250712/scenario.json
